  unnest_tokens(word, body) %>%

  anti_join(stop_words, by = "word") %>% 
  mutate(stem = wordStem(word, language = "porter")) %>% 
  filter(stem %out% c("de", "des", "la", "las", "le", "les")) %>% 
  mutate(stem = recode(stem,
